sentences.en: -- Strengthening the construction of infrastructure and improving the capability to prevent and control pollution.
sentences.cn: -- 加强基础设施建设,提高污染防治能力.

sentences.en: A computer having the capability of time sharing operation.
sentences.cn: 一种具有分时操作能力的计算机.

sentences.en: Abstract : collectivity cooperation innovation capability is the uppermost one of modern enterprise.
sentences.cn: 企业的创新能力是现代企业最主要的竞争能力.

sentences.en: All the photosynthetic bacteria possess the capability in addition to various facultative aerobes and obligate anaerobes.
sentences.cn: 所有光合细菌加上各种兼性的好氧生物和绝对的厌氧生物具有这种能力.

sentences.en: Although visualization often consumes more space, its capability to clearly communicate is well worth the pixels.
sentences.cn: 虽然可视化往往会占用更多的空间, 但占用的这些像素换来了清晰的表达,这是值得的.

sentences.en: Butcons have the pliancy of buttons, along with the fast - recognition capability of images.
sentences.cn: 图标按钮还具备按钮的受范特征, 以及能够快速识别的图像.

sentences.en: I can speak French, but simultaneous translation is beyond my capabilities (= too difficult ) .
sentences.cn: 我能讲法语，但是同声传译我做不了。

sentences.en: I can speak French, but simultaneous translation is beyond my capabilities (= too difficult ).
sentences.cn: 我能讲法语，但是同声传译我做不了。

sentences.en: I understand that your ship has a limited faster - than - light capability?
sentences.cn: 我了解到你的船有一定的超光速飞行的能力?

sentences.en: I was quite taken with your line of photocopiers with collation and stapling capability.
sentences.cn: 我被贵公司能够自动整理和装订的系列复印机吸引住了.

sentences.en: Organizing a whole department is beyond his capability.
sentences.cn: 组织整个部门是他能力以外的事.

sentences.en: She has the capability to become a very fine actress.
sentences.cn: 她有潜力成为杰出演员.

sentences.en: Sometimes extender circuits are used to increase the fan - in capability of digital circuits.
sentences.cn: 有时,使用扩展器电路来提高电路的扇入能力.

sentences.en: The goal of fully - decoded addressing is to provide a complete 64 k addressing capability.
sentences.cn: 全译码寻址法的目的在于提供全部64K的寻址能力.

sentences.en: The target is to train compound talents with speciality, capability and knowledge.
sentences.cn: 其培养目标是造就知识与能力并重的一专多能的复合型人才.

sentences.en: Their scientific know - how, innovation and technical capability are critical to maintaining the nation's competitiveness and productivity.
sentences.cn: 它们的科学知识 、 革新和技术能力对于保持本国的竞争力和生产率来说都是至关重要的.

sentences.en: They have the capability to destroy the enemy in days rather than weeks.
sentences.cn: 他们有能力在几天内，而不是几个星期内消灭敌人。

words.tran_cn: 能干的，能胜任的；有才华的
能力；容量；资格，地位；生产力

phrases.tran_cn: 能力成熟度模型；软件能力成熟度模型
运算能力；工作能力；作业能力
分辨本领；分辨能力；分解能力

trans.tran_en: the natural ability, skill, or power that makes a machine, person, or organization able to do something, especially something difficult
